title: Zelenskiy says he is open to elections if US ensures security | Reuters
snippet: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskiy looks on at Chigi Palace, on the day he meets Italy's Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni in Rome, Italy, December 9, 2025.

title: PM's engagements with President Zelenskyy of Ukraine, President Macron of France, Chancellor Merz of Germany and European partners: 8 December 2025 - GOV.UK
snippet: The Prime Minister welcomed the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of France, Emmanuel Macron, and the Chancellor of Germany, Friedrich Merz, to Downing Street today.

title: Official website of the President of Ukraine
snippet: In his address marking Ukrainian Armed Forces Day, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy spoke about Ukrainian warriors honored through murals in Ukraine and around the world. ... The parties covered multiple aspects and went through key ...

title: Speeches — Official web site of the President of Ukraine
snippet: 12 December 2025 - 14:38 · Today, I am in the Kupyansk sector, with our warriors who are getting the job done for Ukraine here. The Russians kept going on about Kupyansk – the reality speaks for itself. I visited our troops and congratulated them. I thank each of the units, everyone who is fighting here, everyone who is destroying the occupier.

title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, December 13, 2025
snippet: Russian forces launched 495 total missiles and drones against Ukraine overnight on December 12 to 13, heavily targeting energy infrastructure across the country. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky announced that he will hold discussions ...
